Title: ASP.NET 2.0 Wrapper for Office Web Components
Description: ASP.NET controls to wrap Office Web Component 11.0 controls.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ASP.NET controls to wrap Office Web Component 11.0 controls.


The Office Web Components controls are a good way of providing in-browser functionality for connecting to data sources, especially OLAP data using the PivotTable control. Unfortunately, Visual Studio 2005 does not provide a direct way to place these controls on a page. Even after they have been manually placed, there is no easy way to interact with them using server-side code.

The aim of this project is to create a set of ASP.NET 2.0 controls which will allow embedding the OWC controls on an ASP.NET page, and also provide a way to write server-side code using them.
